name: test_e2e_with_logs[582_AUTH_ENCODE_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `AUTH_ENCODE_001` |
| **Name** | Double-encoded slash bypass |
| **Category** | AUTH_BYPASS |
| **Subcategory** | encoded_bypass |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `/admin%2F`
- **Encoded**: `%2Fadmin%252F`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~2000ms
- **Timestamp**: 11:11:57.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX Auth Bypass] Authentication bypass attempt detected` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX Auth Bypass] Authentication bypass attempt detected test_id=AUTH_ENCODE_001-1772277117918-cqaj0r pattern_id=AUTH_ENCODE_001 uri=/?q=%2Fadmin%252F client=127.0.0.1` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence
